doc:
Thomas Carr (director) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Thomas_Carr_(director) 0 Thomas Carr (July 4, 1907 – April 23, 1997) was an American actor and film director of Hollywood movies and television programs. Often billed as "Tommy Carr", he later adopted his more formal "Thomas Carr" birth name as his billing name. Thomas_Carr ( July_4_,_1907 – April_23_,_1997 ) was an_American_actor_and_film_director of Hollywood_movies_and_television_programs . Often billed as " Tommy_Carr " , he later adopted his_more_formal_"_Thomas_Carr_"_birth_name as his_billing_name .
